title: [BUG] ArgumentNullException when loading this jpeg
body:
**Description**

When I load the attached image a `ArgumentNullException` is thrown:

**Code**

```csharp
using (var inputStream = new FileStream("#2804.jpg"))
using (var image = SKBitmap.Decode(inputStream))
{
    return (image.Width, image.Height);
}
```

**Expected Behavior**

The file is loaded and the correct size (2215/1772) is returnde.

**Actual Behavior**

This exception is thrown.
```
Message: 
System.ArgumentNullException : Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'buffer')

  Stack Trace: 
SKManagedStream.OnReadManagedStream(IntPtr buffer, IntPtr size)
SKManagedStream.OnRead(IntPtr buffer, IntPtr size)
SKAbstractManagedStream.ReadInternal(IntPtr s, Void* context, Void* buffer, IntPtr size)
SkiaApi.sk_codec_new_from_stream(IntPtr stream, SKCodecResult* result)
SKCodec.Create(SKStream stream, SKCodecResult& result)
SKCodec.Create(Stream stream, SKCodecResult& result)
SKCodec.Create(Stream stream)
SKBitmap.Decode(Stream stream)
```

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue: 2.88.0 <!-- the version of SkiaSharp that has the issue -->
- Last known good version: 2.80.2 <!-- the version of SkiaSharp that still working -->
- IDE: VS 17.3.0 Preview 1 <!-- Visual Studio / Visual Studio for Mac / MonoDevelop / Visual Studio Code -->
- Platform Target Frameworks: <!-- all that apply, remove the platforms that aren't broken or haven't had any testing -->
  - Windows Classic: Windows 10 <!-- the version of Windows you are building for, e.g. Windows 7 -->
